title: What’s coming for news in 2026? These predictions offer a clue
description: For 16 years now, we’ve asked smart people what they think will happen in the coming year in the world of journalism and digital media. And this year’s collection of predictions, published last month, is the biggest — and, I think, the best — yet. (I may be uniquely qualified to make that judgment, as...
